game.name: Fisher Idle
game.shortDescription: 바다 한가운데에서 어부로 시작하세요! 더 큰 배를 사고, 선박을 업그레이드하고, 낚시 제국을 건설하세요. 기억하세요: 더 많은 물고기는 더 많은 금화를 의미합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Start from scratch in the middle of the ocean as a fisherman! Buy bigger boats, upgrade your ships, and build your fishing empire. Remember: more fish means more gold!

reviewHighlights.text: This is a simple idle game that clearly divides opinion. On the one hand, it offers a very basic gameplay loop that can be completed in about an hour...
